title: Sapphire Baguette Cascade Necklace - A Modern Take on the Traditional Aada
materials: VS Clarity). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a luxurious finish.
features: This necklace features a sleek cascade design using expertly set baguette diamonds that give way to a stunning oval-cut sapphire. The sapphire is surrounded by a halo of smaller diamonds for maximum brilliance. Modern adaptation of the traditional Aada design, known for its pendant and intricate detailing.
colors: Yellow Gold (Metal). A classic and elegant color combination.
occasions: or as a stunning statement piece for a contemporary bride. Also suitable for formal occasions like reception parties or upscale gatherings. Can complement both traditional South Indian attire and modern western wear.
description: A unique blend of modern design with the essence of traditional South Indian jewelry making this piece an instant heirloom. The high-quality sapphire, combined with brilliant diamonds and Hyderabadi polish, creates an exceptionally luxurious and timeless piece. The baguette cut diamonds provide a sophisticated and unique sparkle.
